column4: do you feel it is a good idea to mix two sources in one line?
no, but as they are on the same server and it's done in the default setup too i think it's ok
in default setup there were no multiverse for me at all...
well, there is no problem with it, just feels *for me* somehow not-so-right...
apt-file is also a great tool btw
but you have to install it, and apt-cache is always there :-)
yep, but it's the missing functionality ..... compared to packages.debian.org
and it is Perl, meaning Evil.
i'd try python, but i get lost without all the brackets *g*
you know, some time ago I tried Python. And I was lost. And it happened 4 or 5 times. And one day I managed to force me to read tutorial. Now I hardly remember anything about Perl :-)
